import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import './App.css'; import logo from './assets/logo.png'; import qr from './assets/qr.png'; function App() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const file = e.target.image.files[0]; const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => { const base64Image = reader.result; const formData = { name: form.current.name.value, email: form.current.email.value, occupation: form.current.occupation.value, date: form.current.date.value, whatsapp: form.current.whatsapp.value, message: form.current.message.value, image: base64Image, }; emailjs.send('service_ted5m2h', 'template_nzvxr9o', formData, 'D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv') .then(() => { alert('Session request sent successfully. Our team will contact you after payment confirmation.'); }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error:', error); alert('Something went wrong.\n' + (error?.text || error?.message || JSON.stringify(error))) }); emailjs.send('service_ted5m2h', 'template_5qmfosa', formData, 'D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv'); }; reader.readAsDataURL(file); }; return (

Ghar-ki-Baat

Your space to speak.

What We Do Why Trust Us Pricing Book Session FAQ

When no one listens, we do.

At Ghar-ki-Baat, we offer confidential talk with light therapy that prioritize your emotional wellbeing. Your journey begins with a conversation.

What We Do

We provide private, secure, and empathetic consultation sessions with our team. Whether it's stress, relationship, personal dilemmas, or just the need to talk, Ghar-ki-Baat is here for you.

Why Trust Us?

  • 100% Confidentiality
  • Caring mentors
  • Flexible scheduling

Pricing

1 sessions (60 mins)

₹179

Premium('Clarity')

5 sessions (60 mins) + reflection letter

₹769
